articles.title: Trump administration must accept new DACA applications, judge orders
articles.description: The Trump administration must post a public notice that it will accept new applications for the Obama-era program shielding undocumented immigrants who came to the US as children from deportation, a federal judge ordered Friday.

articles.title: More than half of Americans say they know someone who has been hospitalized or died due to Covid-19, Pew survey finds
articles.description: Slightly more than half of US adults -- 54% -- now say that they know someone who has been hospitalized or died due to Covid-19, according to a new survey from the Pew Research Center.

articles.author: Amanda Watts and Allen Kim, CNN
articles.title: Washington state will be taking down its 'murder hornet' traps for the winter
articles.description: Don't expect to hear of Asian giant "murder hornets" or nests being captured in the coming months. The Washington State Department of Agriculture (WSDA) is taking down their Asian giant hornet traps for the winter.

articles.title: More than 1,000 migrant children in US government custody have tested positive for Covid-19
articles.description: More than 1,000 migrant children in US government custody have tested positive for coronavirus since March, according to the federal agency charged with their care.
